name: CCC UPDATED HINDI and ENGLISH SYLLABUS NIELIT CCC
description: NIELIT CCC    (June 2019)    |          |           |    5       |  This App is based on the LATEST NIELIT CCC SYLLABUS and PATTERN (June 2019) This is a Bilingual app available in ( and English) All Questions in this app are arranged topic wise. Application also contain 5 Practice Sets  More About This app This app is completely based on the Latest 2019 Syllabus of NIELIT CCC / DOEACC CCC . This App Contains CCC Short Notes which are arranged chapter wise NIELIT CCC Syllabus is changing continuously but if you download our app you dont need to worry about this . we monthly update our app with the latest questions.  CCC mock test are provided in this app. This App contains all the chapters of CCC i.e. ,  Introduction to Computer Introduction to Operating System Word Processing Spreadsheet Presentation Introduction to Internet and WWW E-mail ,Social Networking and E-Governance Services Digital Financial Tools and Applications Overview of Future Skills and Cyber Security  Moreover this app also contains  Question on Microsoft Office MS office Microsoft Word MS Word Microsoft Excel MS Excel Microsoft PowerPoint MS PowerPoint   Additional Features of our app  Questions are given Chapter wise  Questions are in both Hindi and English language  Short notes are provided for each chapter  You can shuffle Questions   Its a CCC free and complete course   This is the best app if youre searching for   ccc exam practice app Hindi 2019  ccc practice app with latest syllabus 2019  ccc exam practice app  ccc exam practice app in Hindi  ccc computer course in Hindi book   ccc online test in Hindi   ccc book   ccc mock test   ccc best offline app  ccc best online app  ccc app in Hindi   ccc app in English  nielit ccc exam MCQ  nielit ccc exam practice app  nielit ccc exam mcq in Hindi
